caption.title: In vitro scolicidal efficacy of various medicinal plants and their parts used against protoscoleces of E. granulosus.

tr.td: Flavonoids, steroids, tannins, caffeic acid, ebulitins, α-triterpenes
Antiviral, antibacterial, antifungal, antitumor, antioxidant, antihelminthic, antiprotozoal
Allium cepa L. (= Allium angolense Baker)/ N/A/ Bulb
Pistacia atlantica Desf. (= Pistacia mutica Fisch. & C.A.Mey.) / N/A/ Tree
Spathulenol (20.87), Germacrene B (9.53), β-pinene (1.49), Myrcene (2.85), α-pinene (2.11)
Gastralgia, dyspepsia, peptic ulcer, anti-inflammatory, antipyretic, antibacterial, antiviral
Limonene (26.21), α-Pinene (18.07), α-Thujene (9.31), α-Terpinolene (9.28), Camphene (4.41), β-Pinene (3.06),
Anti-bacterial, anti-viral, anti-fungal, anti-parasitic, anti-inflammatory, anti-nociceptive, anti-athero-genic, anti-diabetic
Rhus coriaria L. (= Toxicodendron coriaria (L.) Kuntze)/ Sumac/ Shrub
Anti-oxidant, anti-fibrogenic, anti-bacterial, anti-diabetic, anti-tumorigenic, hypoglycemic
γ-Terpinene (46.1), cuminaldehyde (15.5), cuminyl alcohol (7.4), ρ-Cymene (6.7), β-Caryophyllene (0.2)
Terpenoids, sulphide derivatives, phenols and minerals
Anthelmintic, antibiotic, antimicrobial, antifungal, anticancer, anti-diabetic and therapeutic properties
Anti-oxidant, cytotoxic, anti-inflammatory, anti-microbial, anti-mutagenic, anti-thrombotic, diuretic
Trachyspermum ammi (L.) Sprague ( Ammi copticum L.)/ Ajowan/ Herb
spasmolytic, wormicide, anti-inflammatory, anti-oxidant, antifungal, antimicrobial, anti-tumors
Isoquinoline alkaloid, carotenoid, flavonoid, tannin, flavonol, triterpene
Antimicrobial, antipyretic, antipruritic, antimetic and cholagogue actions, jaundice, dysentery, choleocystitis, leishmaniasis, gall stones and choleothiasis
Isorhamnetin (13.8), Quercetin (12.9), Caffeic acid (7.2), Sinapic acid (6.7), Vanillin (6.4)
Caffeic acid (13.3), Sinapic acid (7.9), Quercetin (7.8), Vanillin (6.7), Isorhamnetin (6.4)
Dysentery, diarrhea, skin diseases, diuretic, leprosy, asthma
Bittertonic, diaphoretic, vermifuge, antihelmentic, antireumatic, analgesic, antiepileptic, antileprotic and in hemorrhoids
Dendrosicyos socotrana Balf. f./ N/A/ Tree
Anti-malarial, anti-viral, urinary retention, cystitis, symptoms of diabetes, problems with the liver and burns, constipation
Edema, ascites, pulmonary tuberculosis, tinea, febrifuge, cathoratic, antihelminthic and purgative
Jatropha unicostata Balf. f./ N/A/ Tree
Anti-viral activity against influenza type A, Herpes simplex 1
Anti-bacterial, anti-retroviral, anti-viral, anti-oxidant, anti-inflammatory, anti-parasitic
Quercus brantii Lindl. (= Qurecus persica Jaub. & Spach) / Oak/ Tree
Methanolic and essential oil extract showed significant scolicidal efficacy against E granulosus with LC50 values of 135.88 and 79.68 μm/ml respectively.
Mentha piperita L. (= Mentha × adspersa Moench)/ Peppermint/ Herb
α-Pinene (24.7), Linalool (12.6), Myrtenyl acetate (8.3), α-Terpineol (6.1), Linalyl Acetate (5.9), α-Terpinyl acetate (3.8)
Anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, anti-nociceptive, neuroprotective, anti-hepatic ischemia, anti-microbial
Anti-bacterial, anti-fungal and in treatment of splenomegaly
Origanum vulgare L. (= Origanum albiflorum K.Koch)/ Oregano/ Herb
Salvia rosmarinus Spenn. ( = Rosmarinus officinalis L.)/ Rosemary/ Herb
Salvia officinalis L. (= Salvia cretica L.)/ Sage/ Shrub
Thymol (t), Carvacrol (94.9), Thymol acetate (t), γ-Terpinene (0.49), ρ-Cymene (0.55), α –Terpinen (0.26)
Antidiarrheal, antispasmodic, anti-inflammatory, vasodilator, antioxidant, antibacterial, antiviral, antifungal
Anti-microbial, anti-inflammatory, anti-amoebic, anti-fungal, anti-parasitic, anti-bacterial
Zataria multiflora Boiss. (= Zataria bracteata Boiss.) / Avishan Sherazi/ Herb
Thymol (40.8), Carvacrol (27.8), β-Caryophyllene (2.0), Linalool (1.7), α-Terpinolene (1.3), ρ-Cymene (8.4), Thymol acetate (0.5)
Analgesic, antiseptic, antibacterial, antifungal, antiprotozoal, anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, immunostimulant, pain-relieving
Ziziphora tenuior L. (= Faldermannia parviflora Trautv.)/ N/A/ Herb
Polegon (87), thymol (3.4), piperitenone (12.19), mentha-2-ethanol (31.5), carvacrol (10.5), menthone (46.4), neomenthol (78.4)

25 mg/ml concentration exhibited the highest scolicidal activity after 10 minutes of post-incubation. Considering the effect of different fractions Fof Z. tenuior against protoscoleces, the ethanolic fraction showed the highest effect followed by ethyl acetate, petroleum ether, and chloroform, respectively.
Antiseptic, antifungal, antibacterial, used in uterine diseases and dysentery
Alkaloids, glycosides, terpenoids, steroids, flavonoids, tannins
Myrtus communis L. (= Myrtus acuta Mill.)/ Myrtle/ Shrub
α-Pinene (24.7), 1,8- Cineole (19.6), Linalool (12.6), Myrtenyl acetate (8.3), α-Terpineol (6.1), Linalyl Acetate (5.9)
Flavonols, caffeic acid, gallic acid, oleuropein
Anti-oxidant, anti-allergic, anti-inflammatory, anti-microbial, anti-tumor, anti-hypersensitivity, anti-anthrogenic
Pinus nigra Arn. subsp. pallasiana (Lamb.) Holmboe /N/A/ Tree
wound healing, Hemorrhoids, diabetes, liver diseases, cold, bronchitis, stomachache, and fungal infections on the skin
Anti-coccidial, anthelmintic, anti-bacterial, anti-oxidant, anti-inflammatory, anti-microbial
Nigella sativa L. ( Nigella cretica Mill.)/ Black cumin seed/ Herb
Thymoquinone (42.4), ρ-Cymene (14.1), carvacrol (10.3), longifolene (6.1), 4-terpineol (5.1), t-anethole (2.3), limonene (1.7), thymol (1.2)
Anti-inflammatory, cough, bronchitis, eczema, influenza, anti-microbial, anti-cancer, anti-oxidant, anti-bacterial, anti-viral, anti-fungal, anti-parasitic
Alkaloids, tannins, saponins, flavonoids, sterols, terpenoids
Anorexia, biliary disorders, cough, coryza, sinusitis, rheumatism, anti-inflammatory
oxygenated monoterpenes, sesquiterpene hydrocarbons and oxygenated sesquiterpenes;
Hepatoprotective, anti-cancer, anti-analgesic, anti-allergen, and antimicrobial
Zingiber officinale Roscoe (= Amomum zingiber L.)/ Ginger/ Herb
Camphene (15.9), α–terpineol (8.8), farnesene (8.8), p-cineole (8.4), zingiberene (7.5), β-mycrene (7.7)
Arthritis, atherosclerosis, migraine headaches, rheumatoid arthritis, high cholesterol, ulcers, depression, impotence, common cold, antioxidant, antimicrobial, anti-inflammatory, antifungal
